SCTX:
begin BarDoor

float timer
short On
short Open

if (MenuMode == 0)

   if (OnActivate == 1)

      if (On == 0)
         set timer to 0
         set On to 1
		PlaySound3D, "Door Creaky Open"
      endif

   endif

   if (On == 1)

      set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

      if (Open == 0)

         if (timer < 1)
            rotate x, 110

         elseif (timer >= 1)
            set On to 0
            set Open to 1

         endif

      elseif (Open == 1)

         if (timer < 1)
            rotate x, -110

         elseif (timer >= 1)
            SetatStart
            set On to 0
            set Open to 0

         endif

      endif

   endif

endif

end   ; BarDoor
